c74object.name: nn.terrain~
c74object.digest: Latent terrain priors for neural audio autoencoders, for generating latent vectors
c74object.description: Latent terrain priors for neural audio autoencoders, for generating latent vectors

objarg.name: latent_dim
objarg.digest: Dimensionality of the autoencoder's latent space
objarg.description: Dimensionality of the autoencoder's latent space.

objarg.name: gauss_scale
objarg.digest: (Optional) Gaussian scale of the neural network
objarg.description: (Optional) Gaussian scale of the neural network. A float value between 0-1 is suggested, by default is 0.1. A higher Gaussian scale leads to a noisy terrain. If the Gaussian scale is 0, the Fourier feature mapping layer will be removed, will result in a smooth (low frequency) terrain.

objarg.name: network_channel
objarg.digest: (Optional) Number of channels in the neural network's fully connected layers, by default is 128
objarg.description: (Optional) Number of channels in the neural network's fully connected layers, by default is 128

objarg.name: feature_size
objarg.digest: (Optional) Size of the random Fourier feature mapping, higher feature size is suggested when using high dimensional control space, by default is 256
objarg.description: (Optional) Size of the random Fourier feature mapping, higher feature size is suggested when using high dimensional control space, by default is 256.

objarg.name: buffer_size
objarg.digest: (Optional) Size of the internal buffer (the same as decoder's compression ratio is suggested)
objarg.description: (Optional) Size of the internal buffer (the same as decoder's compression ratio is suggested).

objarg.name: checkpoint_path
objarg.digest: If only one argument is given, it should be the path to a model checkpoint
objarg.description: If only one argument is given, it should be the path to a model checkpoint.

method.name: checkpoint
method.digest: Checkpoint and save the terrain model
method.description: Checkpoint and save the terrain model

method.name: new
dictionary
method.digest: Use a dictionary to gather training data for the terrain (will replace what has been loaded before)
method.description: Use a dictionary to gather training data for the terrain (will replace what has been loaded before).

method.name: train
method.digest: Train the terrain model with one batch
method.description: Train the terrain model with one batch

method.name: plot_interval
method.digest: Sample the terrain across a closed interval to plot into the GUI, only 2D interval dimension is supported at the moment
method.description:
Sample the terrain across a closed interval to plot into the GUI, only 2D interval dimension is supported at the moment.
Args:
1D [not implemented]: lo, hi, resolution;
2D: values at left, top, right, bottom, x_resolution, y_resolution, color_channel (optional, default 1)

attribute.name: gpu
attribute.digest: Enable / disable gpu usage when available
attribute.description: Enable / disable gpu usage when available

attribute.name: training_batchsize
attribute.digest: batch size when training the nn
attribute.description: batch size when training the nn

attribute.name: training_lr
attribute.digest: learning rate when training the nn
attribute.description: learning rate when training the nn

attribute.name: training_epoch
attribute.digest: (int) train the model for this many epochs when one train message is received
attribute.description: (int) train the model for this many epochs when one train message is received
